overview: Seldom has a relatively young band such as Hammerfall had so much influence on the metal scene. The Swedish heavy metallers have had their ups and downs, but their 15 year old legacy is packed with great albums and songs many consider modern-day heavy metal anthems. Gates of Dalhalla is the bandâ€™s second live album, recorded during a very special show in their homeland.
title: Hammerfall: Gates of Dalhalla
